section1.desc1: An Open Source Spatiotemporal Data Analysis Platform
section1.desc2: Arctern is designed to accelerate the processing, analysis and visualization of spatiotemporal data. Based on most popular open source big data technology, we are building a flexible, powerful, high performance analysis platform for people to meet the spatio-temporal data challenge in 5G/IoT era.

section2.title: What is Arctern
section2.content: Arctern is an open source similarity search engine for massive-scale feature vectors. Built with heterogeneous computing architecture for the best cost efficiency. Searches over billion-scale vectors take only milliseconds with minimum computing resources. Arctern can be used in a wide variety of scenarios to boost AI development.

list.title: Powerful spatio-temporal functions
list.content: Support key OGC standard APIs, location algorithm and spatio-temporal models.

list.title: Viz Interaction
list.content: SQL based interaction capability. Arctern provides fast and vivid results for spatio-temporal analysis with server rendering technology.

list.title: Any scale
list.content: Arctern could be deployed on any scenarios from single laptop to cluster containing multiple servers. While the user experience remain the same.

list.title: Modern Data Science Technology
list.content: Arctern integrates technology like Python, Spark etc. Users don't need to change their existing data analysis method and process.

list.title: Programming Language Supports
list.content: Python, Restful, C++. Users could easily adopt Arctern with great flexibility.

list.title: Heterogeneous Computing
list.content: Supports X86 and GPU. Arctern could help users to reduce hardware cost.

section8.title: Scenarios
section8.desc: Step-by-step instructions to solve AI problems with Arctern.

img1.title: Reverse Image Search
img1.content: High-performance, customizable reverse image search system built with the VGG neural network model

img2.title: Personalized Recommender System
img2.content: High-performance recommender system built with the PaddlePaddle deep learning platform

img3.title: Chemical Structure Similarity Search
img3.content: High-performance similarity search of massive-scale chemical structures

section7.title: Resources
section7.desc: Find us and join the conversation on any of these platforms

section1.title: Building The Search Engine For The AI Era
section1.desc: Adopted by over 100 organizations and institutions worldwide, Arctern empowers applications in a variety of fields, including image processing, computer vision, natural language processing, voice recognition, recommender systems, drug discovery, etc.

section2.desc1: The demand for processing unstructured data such as pictures, videos, voices, and text is continuously increasing with the emergence of emerging applications such as smart cities, short videos, personalized product recommendations, and visual product search. The most mainstream method for processing these unstructured data is to use artificial intelligence technology (deep learning algorithms) to extract the features of these unstructured data, and use feature vectors to represent them, and then calculate and retrieve these feature vectors to achieve non-unstructured data. Analysis and retrieval of structured data.
section2.desc2: Arctern is designed to facilitate users to easily calculate and retrieve feature vectors. It supports rich feature vector indexing algorithms and the scheduling of heterogeneous computing resources. It has a complete user interface, data management components, and graphical management tools. Cloud-native The design concept allows Arctern to easily achieve horizontal expansion and high availability based on K8S. Since the product has been open sourced, it has received recognition and support from a large number of users. At present, the global community scale exceeds 3,000 people and there are more than 50 enterprise users.
section2.desc3: With the optimization of vector retrieval algorithms and the integration of heterogeneous computing resources, Arctern can provide stable and high-performance vector retrieval support for enterprise applications. In most scenarios, when the Top 1 recall rate is guaranteed to be 100%, and the Top100 recall rate is not less than 95%, the retrieval time for millions of data scales is 0.01 seconds, and the retrieval time for 100 million data scales is 0.1 seconds. Retrieval time of billions of data scale seconds.

list.title: Computer Vision
list.desc: Arctern can support various applications in the field of computer vision with picture and video processing as its core, especially the efficient processing of ultra-large-scale data, making Arctern widely used in the field of computer vision.

list.title: Natural language processing
list.desc: Vectorization of semantic features for words, sentences, articles, etc. is becoming the mainstream technology for natural language processing. Semantic analysis by comparing the distance of semantic feature vectors is being adopted by a large number of semantic analysis solutions. Usability, has been widely used in related fields.

list.title: Traditional vector calculations
list.desc: There are also a lot of vector calculation scenarios in the traditional data processing field. Using traditional calculation methods requires a lot of computing power. With advanced algorithms, Arctern can increase the vector data processing capacity by at least two orders of magnitude with the same computing power resources.

list.title: Audio data processing
list.desc: There are also a large number of vector calculation scenarios in the traditional data processing field. Using traditional calculation methods requires a large amount of computing power. With advanced algorithms, Arctern can increase the vector data processing capacity by at least two orders of magnitude with the same computing power resources.
